name: One-jump Jack
description:
One-Jump Jack

An entry for GMTK Game Jam 2019, for which the theme was "Only one", hence "One-jump Jack". Jump to the desired height, then control your descent to get safely to the flag in each level.

Controls:
  • Left: A / left arrow
  • Right: D / Right arrow
  • Jump: Space (hold longer to jump higher)

Please let me know if you enjoyed playing :)
